trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Redding
There were no other sightings in Redding on or around November 14th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my back yard with my mom an my girlfriend doing yard work, when i stop to get a drink of water I noticed a plane heading north-eastish.im staring at this plane i see a flash of an orange ball that was lower an further out then the plane but heading the opposite direction of the plane (southwest).I tell my mo to get the banoculares so i can get a better look. As soon as shegets back outside i zero in on it, all tho it was blurry from being so far away i could make out a cigar shape with a wider rear which was where the flashinglight was coming from. it wasnt like a comercal planes lights, it blinked in slow intervals an i could see it in day light as clear as if it were at night. after i was done looking at i handed my mom the banoculares so she could see it, she looked at it for a minute or two an it just faded away.
